TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Reusable Commerical Vehicle Program

Articles.Content:
EDIT: THE IMAGE IS OFF BY A FACTOR OF 100, ACTUAL CARGO REQUIRED IS 5U

tl;dr rules:

SSTO ala K Prize

Carry at least 5U in cargo, you can\'t use the cargo to help you

Have an escape system that can de-orbit itself

Please note that I will not keep track of winners because I don\'t visit the forums often enough for that. This isn\'t a competition, it\'s a challenge to test yourself against. Have fun. Mods allowed except cheat mods, again, this is up to your discretion. Sorry for the terrible anti-aliasing on the font, I\'m too cheap to buy Office so I\'m using LibreOffice.

Um, 500U as cargo? That\'s.. about four times the size of the largest SSTO monstrosity that I have built. I.e., this one.

Clarification on that cargo mass, please? 500 mass units delivered to orbit would require a rocket five times the size of the launch tower.
Aww, shit. I was looking at capacity instead of weight. Let\'s say 5U.
